hero.title: Welcome to Dalai Eej Resort
hero.subtitle: A sanctuary of peace on the shores of Mongolia's Blue Pearl

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Nestled on the pristine shores of Khuvsgul Lake National Park, Dalai Eej Resort is a homegrown destination born from a deep love for Mongolia's untouched wilderness. We are dedicated to elevating Mongolian hospitality standards while staying true to our authentic roots. Every detail of our resort reflects our commitment to showcasing the natural beauty and rich cultural heritage of this extraordinary region.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.quote: Our goal is to showcase the unique, pristine value of our national park to the world.
mission.content: We strive to be the leading hospitality destination in the Khuvsgul region, bridging the warmth of local traditions with the comfort of modern amenities. Our mission is to create unforgettable experiences that connect guests with the spirit of Mongolia.

experience.title: The Experience
experience.subtitle: Discover what awaits you at Dalai Eej Resort

nature.title: Peaceful Nature
nature.desc: Wake up to crystal-clear waters, ancient forests, and pristine mountain landscapes untouched by time.

culture.title: Authentic Culture
culture.desc: Immerse yourself in genuine Mongolian hospitality, traditions, and the timeless wisdom of nomadic life.

escape.title: A True Escape
escape.desc: Step away from the busy world and reconnect with yourself in one of Earth's last great wildernesses.

cta.title: Begin Your Journey
cta.subtitle: Experience the magic of Khuvsgul Lake and create memories that will last a lifetime.

hero.title: The Ultimate Nature Escape
hero.subtitle: Situated on the pristine shores of Lake Khuvsgul, Dalai Eej Resort offers a sanctuary of comfort in the heart of the National Park.

items.yurts: Luxury & Standard Yurts with Lake Views

dining.title: Flavors of the Steppe
dining.desc: Experience warm Mongolian hospitality. From hearty Khorkhog (stone-cooked meat) to fresh European favorites, our restaurant serves delicious meals prepared with local ingredients. Enjoy your morning coffee while watching the sunrise over the lake.

activities.title: Adventures on the Blue Pearl
activities.desc: The lake is your playground. Charter a motorboat to the islands, hike the surrounding larch forests, or experience the nomadic lifestyle on a guided horse trek through the valley.

relaxation.title: Disconnect to Reconnect
relaxation.desc: Far from the city lights and noise. Spend your evenings by a crackling bonfire, gazing at the Milky Way, or relaxing in our wood-fired sauna after a day of exploration.

review1.text: Waking up to the sound of the waves and the smell of pine trees was magical. The yurt was cozy and warm even on chilly nights.
review1.author: Sarah J., USA

review2.text: The staff went above and beyond to help us organize a trip to the Reindeer herders. Truly the highlight of our Mongolia trip.
review2.author: Bat-Erdene, Ulaanbaatar

review3.text: Perfect location. Right on the water, but quiet and peaceful. The food at the restaurant was surprisingly good for such a remote spot!
review3.author: Alex & Marie, France

grandSuite.title: Grand Peninsula Suite
grandSuite.subtitle: The resort's premier residence
grandSuite.description: Designed for families or groups seeking a shared sanctuary, this suite offers the resort's most commanding vantage point. Spacious residences feature panoramic windows framing the lake, ensuring the view is never more than a glance away.
features: Access to shared hot showers nearby

familyCabin.title: Family Ensuite Cabin
familyCabin.subtitle: Generous space for groups
familyCabin.description: A generous cabin designed for groups who value shared space. Offers the convenience of two large beds in a single private setting with a private veranda.
features: Choice of wood stove or electric heating
Access to shared hot showers nearby

comfortCabin.title: Comfort Ensuite Cabin
comfortCabin.subtitle: Rustic charm with modern privacy
comfortCabin.description: A secluded retreat balancing rustic charm with essential privacy. Perfect for couples or small families who value their own space.
features: Choice of wood stove or electric heating
Access to shared hot showers nearby

standardCabin.title: Standard Lakeside Cabin
standardCabin.subtitle: Our heritage experience
standardCabin.description: Ideally positioned in the heart of the resort, these authentic wood-fired cabins offer a classic Khuvsgul stay. Located on level ground just steps from the dining lodge.
features: Access to shared toilets and hot showers

lodgeRoom.title: The Lodge Room
lodgeRoom.subtitle: Accessible and carefree
lodgeRoom.description: Situated within the main lodge, these rooms offer a temperate, maintenance-free refuge without the need for a wood stove. Ideal for those prioritizing convenience.
features: Access to shared toilets and hot showers
